properties.property: [Character [Enemy Kyla] Upward True False [Sequence [ClearSpirits [FadeOutSong 120] [Wait 120] [PlaySong 120 0 0 0.5 [Field Unfolding]] [Wait 180] [Dialog "What is freedom...?"] [Wait 120] [Dialog "It must be the death of purpose..."] [Wait 60] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Leftward] [Wait 60] [Dialog "I was raised to be a servant of a servant."] [Wait 120] [Dialog "My master is cruel, but unlike the world, her cruelty is predictable."] [Wait 120] [Dialog "I came under her ward when my mother passed, but I think she always hated me."] [Wait 60] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Downward] [Wait 60] [Dialog "Yet her spite is something to which I have become accustomed."] [Wait 120] [Dialog "It is the chaos beyond these castle walls that I can not bear."] [Wait 60] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Leftward] [Wait 60] [Dialog "The insanity of this decaying world... terrifies me."] [Wait 60] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Upward] [Wait 60] [Dialog "I can never leave this place..."] [FadeOutSong 120] [Fade [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] 150] [ReplaceAdvent [KylaAdvent 0] [KylaAdvent 1]] [PlaySong 120 0 0 0.5 [Castle CastlePart1]] [Wait 120] [PlaySound 0.5 [Field Unlatch]] [Dialog "Something unlatched..."]]] [[KylaAdvent 0]]]
